review: The doctor is very friendly and listen your symptoms carefully.  I have visited her at Apollo Spectra Hospital for a leg pain and she prescribed appropriate medicine for the pain relief and has asked to do further investigations to check for the root cause of the pain and has prescribed antibiotic medication only after checking the results.
Doctor was friendly and listened patiently to all my issues.Experienced doctor and did not give unwanted antibiotic medications

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the few doctors who will spend quality time listening to you, studying available documents and suggesting preventive methods of treatment and moving to medication only when needed. Highly recommended

Visited for normal stomach ache issue. But the doctor was so insensible that she left the hospital before she could look the patient.Also, the hospital do not have courtesy to inform you about the same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was warm and understanding.  she identified the problem correctly and was friendly, compassionate and informative.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ****** she explains entire disease in detail which gives you confidence in the overall process that follows

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Listening to patient history and appreciating their concern and answering them patiently .

Also provided easier to way to reach the doctor .
I had to wait over one hour for a 5 minute exam. I was promised that wait time would be less than an hour
